body: Many tieflings have tails, but some have long, flexible tails that can be used to carry items. While they cannot wield weapons with their tails, they can use them to retrieve small, stowed objects carried on their persons as a swift action. This racial trait replaces fiendish sorcery.
name: Prehensile Tail
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Tieflings/Alternate Racial Traits/Prehensile Tail
